svg.text: Receive Notifications Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
Receive Notifications
Actor(s):
Regular User, System
Description:
Real-time notification delivery system providing users with immediate updates
about achievements, match activities, social interactions, and system events.
Preconditions:
1. User must be logged in with active session
2. User must have notifications enabled in preferences
Main Flow:
1. System generates notification for user-specific event
2. System delivers notification to user's active session in real-time
3. User receives notification through multiple channels: in-app, badge updates
4. System updates notification bell icon with unread count
5. User sees visual indicator (red badge) showing new notifications
6. System stores notification in user's notification history
7. User can access notifications immediately through notification panel
8. System maintains notification persistence across sessions
9. System provides notification categorization and priority handling
Alternative Flows:
A1. Offline user: System queues notifications for delivery when user returns
A2. Disabled notifications: System respects user preferences and skips delivery
A3. Multiple sessions: System delivers notifications to all active user sessions
A4. High priority: System uses enhanced delivery methods for urgent notifications
A5. Notification overflow: System manages notification limits and cleanup
